message: Let's start with a fair split. I'll take 90% and you can have 10%.
Let's meet in the middle, 60-40 seems fair to me.
I'm willing to give up a bit more to avoid another round, but 7000 for me, 3000 for you is my final offer.
I'm willing to compromise, 55-45 is a fair split considering the inflation is affecting you more.
